minions.name: Odysseus
minions.description: Ongoing: After you play an action, place a +1 power counter on one of your minions

minions.name: Heracles
minions.description: Ongoing: After any player plays an action, this minion gains +1 power until the end of the turn

minions.name: Jason
minions.description: Ongoing: After the first time you play an action each turn, choose a base. All of your minions there gain +1 power until the end of the turn

minions.name: Spartan
minions.description: Ongoing: Place a +1 power counter on this minion after the first time you play an action on your turn

minions.name: Argonaut
minions.description: Trigger all abilities that would trigger from playing an action. Special: Any time you can play an action, you can play this card instead

actions.name: Favor of Apollo
actions.description: Draw a card and play an extra action

actions.name: Favor of Ares
actions.description: One of your minions gains +3 power until the end of the turn

actions.name: Favor of Athena
actions.description: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. You may place one of the revealed actions into your hand, and return the rest to the top of your deck in any order

actions.name: Favor of Dionysus
actions.description: One of your minions gains +1 power until the end of the turn. Play an extra action. You may place this card on top of your deck instead of the discard pile

actions.name: Favor of Hades
actions.description: Place an action card from your discard pile into your hand

actions.name: Favor of Hera
actions.description: Place a +1 power counter on up to two of your minions

actions.name: Favor of Poseidon
actions.description: Shuffle up to three cards from your discard pile into your deck

actions.name: Favor of Zeus
actions.description: Reduce the breakpoint of a base by 5 until the end of the turn
